segments.text: The warm light coming through that window makes everything seem so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, here I am, fixated on the chaos happening just a few feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman just keeps polishing that plate, entirely oblivious to the impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the water glistening on the cabinet doors, and I wonder when sheâ€™ll notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The joy of the children seems almost infectious, but I can't shake the fear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her calmness contrasts so drastically with their excitement, it's unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Part of me wishes for chaos; maybe it would bring her back to reality.
segments.speaker: PAR
